title: Customer Service Representative (CSR)
job_overview:
Seeking a professional, Customer Service Representative (CSR) with excellent verbal and friendly customer service skills. This CSR position will interact with different customers to handle inbound inquiries and answer service calls.

***PLEASE INCLUDE A VIDEO RECORDING INTRODUCING YOURSELF WITH THE INTRO SAYING "HI CONTACT AUTOMATION, MY NAME IS....." AND THEN SHARING THREE INTERESTING FACTS ABOUT YOURSELF OUTSIDE OF WORK.***

***FLUENT ENGLISH IS REQUIRED***

***MUST HAVE A QUIET SPACE TO WORK AT HOME***

***MUST HAVE RELIABLE INTERNET SERVICE & DIRECTLY PLUGGED INTO YOUR MODEM.***

***DUAL MONITORS ARE REQUIRED***

***PLEASE INCLUDE A VIDEO OR PHOTO OF YOUR HOME OFFICE SETUP DETAILS.***

Requirements:

- Working hours: Must have OPEN availability. Saturdays and Sundays open availability is a must!
- At least 1 year previous phone customer support call center experience.
- High attention to detail and strong organizational skills
- Excellent verbal and written English communication skills
- Ability to MULTI-TASK in FAST-PACED environment, including phone and email support
- Great customer service personality and upbeat attitude
- Ability to work independently while managing multiple projects and with minimal supervision

As a Customer Service Representative, you will serve as the first point of contact for a variety of different customers handling a wide array of requests. With incoming phone calls, you will handle different requests based on the specific client’s scripts and instructions. Whether you assist in scheduling a service, processing a payment, or taking a message, you will make each customer interaction a successful positive call.

We work in a team atmosphere that strives to meet the CA call center’s goals each month. Your computer skills, problem-solving, and commitment to creating an awesome interaction experience will ensure your success!
